name: Himanshu
description: As a student developer, I'm passionate about full-stack development with expertise in Full Stack, Docker, Git, CI/CD (GitHub Actions, CircleCI), cloud computing (Azure), load balancing, API Gateway, and reverse proxy Nginx. I have hands-on experience in building applications, including a student application, through self-projects and 3+ freelance projects.

contents.name: My History
contents.description: Hi, introduce my self Himanshu, I am currently pursuing a Bachelor of Technology (BTech) degree with a specialization in Computer Science and Engineering, focusing on Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning (CSE AIML). My educational journey began with a Diploma in Information Technology at Hewett Polytechnic Lucknow, where I achieved an impressive grade of 80%.

contents.name: What am i Doing
contents.description: I am currently working as a freelance Full Stack Developer, specializing in web application development. I have successfully completed over three projects and actively contribute to open-source initiatives. My skill set includes a wide range of technologies, such as React.js, Next.js, Node.js, Express.js, MongoDB/MYSQL, GraphQL, REST API, Docker, Git, CI/CD tools like GitHub Actions and CircleCI, cloud computing with Azure, load balancing, API Gateway, and reverse proxy with Nginx. I am dedicated to creating scalable and maintainable software solutions while continuously expanding my expertise.

contents.name: What Next
contents.description: My goal now is to master Frontend, Backend and DevOps technology and become a Fullstack Developer. So that I can build a solution to an existing problem easily. Even though it is not easy and it takes a long time, I believe I can achieve it if I practice and learn continuously.

contents.name: Dreams and Wishes
contents.description: My dreams and wishes are to build a thriving tech industry in India. To inspire and mentor others to create a better future.

contents.name: Freelance Full Stack Developer
contents.description: I am currently working as a freelance Full Stack Developer with a track record of successfully delivering over three projects. My freelance work has provided me with hands-on experience and opportunities to showcase my skills in web development.

contents.name: Techpile Technology Pvt. Ltd.
contents.description: In my first internship, I focused on web development using PHP, Bootstrap, and MySQL. I completed 3-4 projects, including a job portal and an online exam site. This experience improved my skills and provided hands-on experience in web application development.
